snippet: When Beatriz Rivera was a child, her family moved from Mexico to Yonkers. But the possibility of deportation limited her job opportunities.
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, one of the seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Beatriz Rivera, a Mexican immigrant living in Yonkers, NY, pay for Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals application that would allow her to obtain work permit.
lead_paragraph: When Beatriz Rivera was a child, her family moved from Mexico to Yonkers. But the possibility of deportation limited her job opportunities.

headline.main: Fighting to Keep a Life Built in the United States
